Lines: Currently, Lhasa Base is under
siege by massive Federation forces.
It seems that plan to escape with
Zanzibar is already underway.
Correct.
We're going to help them escape.
Enemy seems fixated on attacking that mountain,
their rear guard seems mighty thin.
They have deployed multiple artillery units in city.
This will threaten Zanzibar launch.
Yes.
Our targets are tank-types with long range
bombardment capabilities
...The force disparity is unfavorable.
If we don't withdraw right after taking out artillery
we won't be able to get out unscathed, right?
It seems so...
I know. Even I value my life, don't I?
Not really...
Targets are dispersed over whole city.
It's dangerous, but we'll have to disperse our forces.
After eliminating your targets, head to rendezvous point.
Well, its decided. Let's clean them up.
Good. Brauer's Team, prepare to sortie!
Roger that!
